meanings.definition: Resembling pus in appearance or consistency.
meanings.sent1: The infected wound had a puslike discharge.
meanings.sent2: The spoiled milk had a puslike smell.
meanings.sent3: The garbage can had a puslike odor after sitting in the sun all day.
meanings.sent4: The stagnant pond water had a puslike texture, thick and unpleasant.
meanings.sent5: The moldy bread had a puslike appearance, green and slimy.

meanings.sent1: The rotten fruit had a puslike consistency when squeezed.
meanings.sent2: The expired yogurt had a puslike color, off-white and unappetizing.
meanings.sent3: The old cheese had a puslike taste, sour and unpleasant.
meanings.sent4: The muddy swamp had a puslike smell, foul and nauseating.
meanings.sent5: The decaying plant had a puslike appearance, wilted and slimy.
